definitions.definition: A positive emotion including wonder and approbation ; the regarding of another as being wonderful
examples: They looked at the landscape in admiration .

definitions.definition: Wondering or questioning (without any particular positive or negative attitude to the subject).
Cause of admiration; something to excite wonder, or pleased surprise.

main_definition: A positive emotion including wonder and approbation ; the regarding of another as being wonderful
